name: rendertron
description: Renders webpages using headless Chrome for usage by bots

scripts.format: npm run format:eslint && npm run format:prettier
scripts.test: (cd test-resources && npm install) && npm run build && ava build/test/app-test.js --timeout 5s
scripts.start-emulator: (gcloud beta emulators datastore start --no-store-on-disk --project emulator-project --host-port localhost:8380 &) 2>&1 | grep -m1 'now running'
scripts.test-cache: npm run build && npm run start-emulator && $(gcloud beta emulators datastore env-init) && export GCLOUD_PROJECT=emulator-project && ava build/test/*-cache-test.js
